title: r/Maliciouscompliance "IF YOU DON'T LIKE IT, QUIT!" "lol ok, bye!"
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance We've all had terrible bosses, right? The terrible boss in today's video goes off on a total power trip and shouts at OP to quit if he doesn't like the job. So... he quits! Well, it turns out that OP is a pretty critical member of the team, so the boss immediately does a 180 and begs for OP to come back! If you like this video and want to see more, hit the subscribe button for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y5ZVuXlfF0c
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
